name: Tale of Jade Li Guang
storyline:
The inspiration of the story "Tale of Jade Li Guang came from the remains of the Yaoshan altar of the Liangzhu culture in China. There are twelve tombs at the Yaoshan site, and based on this background, we created a story and name 12 ritual rooms by Twelve Branches.

The Twelve Branches are the traditional Chinese concept of timekeeping. At the same time, in the traditional concept, the Twelve Branches also related to the internal organs. The two concepts corresponding to the Twelves Branches will influence the development of the plot in the game.
summary: Tale of Jade Li Guang is a stand-alone roguelike card game with oriental elements. Gameplay involves constructing your own deck by 5 elements cards, exploring the map, solving random encounters, beating the demon and uncovering the mystery of Li Guang's Kingdom.
